Description: Barrel bead. A bi-conical bobbin-shaped bead, thicker at one end than the other, in semi-translucent dark-blue glass. Most of the body is encircled by a chevron pattern formed by trailed threads of opaque white and yellow glass. At each end of the bead is a rim of opaque white glass.
Curator's comments: Sale Catalogue, Henry Salt Collection, Sotheby, London, 28 June – 8 July 1835, lot 472.
